title: S'PORE PERVERTS BRAZENLY SHARING UPSKIRT VIDEOS OF LOCAL GIRLS ONLINE, SPF UNABLE TO PROTECT CITIZEN'S MODESTY
text:
S'PORE PERVERTS BRAZENLY SHARING UPSKIRT VIDEOS OF LOCAL GIRLS ONLINE, SPF UNABLE TO PROTECT CITIZEN'S MODESTY   
here: https://www.allsingaporestuff.com/article/girls-need-be-careful-when-usi... Advertisement 
I regret to inform you that your article is actually true and the Singapore Poodle Force has indeed been ineffective at stopping perverts and protecting the modesty of women. 
Here is a news tip off for your site: (link removed; we do not condone the spread of pornographic material on our website) The link leads to a major hive of pervert activity. 
Perverts have moved beyond sammyboy forum and are now using file sharing sites to share photos of Singaporean girls who use the toilets. 
Look at the hundreds of xmms that have been filmed peeing in the toilets. I wonder what will happen if these videos become viral when these women have started their careers. There is nothing to protect women from perverts now. 
The technology has become so advanced that the poodle force officers are just unable to keep up. When they could not even fight Indians in self-defence during the Little India Riot, do you expect them to protect women from perverts? 
White Knight A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
